name: Herdmaster
description:
In this game you play as the Herdmaster. A herd of creatures will follow you whereever you go. Wild herds exist around the world, and defeating their leaders makes the rest of their herd join yours. Accumulate the biggest herd you can!

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move around, your herd will follow. When your creatures run into creatures of the other herds, they will attack.

(beware the megaherd)

Created in 48 hours for GMTK 2021, theme: Joined Together
